<!-- %:::% list-of-abbreviations body begin %:::% -->
~F~
: \hspace{20cm} Subscript indicating a relation with work-free days.

~W~
: \hspace{20cm} Subscript indicating a relation with workdays.

MCTQ
: \hspace{20cm} Munich ChronoType Questionnaire.

MCTQ^PT^
: \hspace{20cm} Portuguese version of the MCTQ.

MEQ
: \hspace{20cm} Morningness-Eveningness Questionnaire

MSF
: \hspace{20cm} Local time of mid-sleep on work-free days.

MSF~sc~
: \hspace{20cm} Chronotype proxy. The midpoint between sleep onset and sleep end on work-free days. A sleep correction (~SC~) is made when a possible sleep compensation related to a lack of sleep on workdays is identified.

MSW
: \hspace{20cm} Local time of mid-sleep on workdays.
<!-- %:::% list-of-abbreviations body end %:::% -->
